short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inject custom CSS styles into specific websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom CSS Injector is a versatile Chrome extension that allows you to personalize the appearance of your favorite websites. Inject your own custom CSS styles to change colors, fonts, layouts, and more, creating a browsing experience tailored to your preferences.
